name: Normal Diner
description:
It's just another peaceful night at the Normal Diner. Serve up sandwiches with a smile, and survive as long as you can!

Controls:

Arrow keys (or WASD) and spacebar for everything

Credits:

Game + art + sound: Nathan, Diana, Anderson

Music: 'masters of disguise' by ko0x and bzl

Fonts: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen + Creatures by Signalgrau

(other sounds: shop doorbell from freesounds, bfxr for a few effects)

(Made for GMTK Jam 2020, with the theme "Out of Control".)

Small bug: Late in the game, there's a long-winded question that starts with "Can I have a BLT with no bacon? ..." that we forgot to assign a correct answer. Unfortunately, you'll just have to ignore that question and lose a little health -- sorry! 😢
